Title: Stasis
Writer: Farhad Safinia (creator), Bradford Winters, Angelina Burnett (story)
Actors: Kelsey Grammer, Connie Nielsen, Hannah Ware, Jeff Hephner
Plot: Just days away from the election, Kane slowly regains control over City Hall. Though a swift political move will help identify his adversaries, will doing the unthinkable improve his public image in time?
